comments.body: @s-hertel I believe this is actually incorrect. I must omit the `cluster_id` parameter to get the ElastiCache service to take a snapshot of a replication group. In the next few days, I'll get my changes put into a PR and I can show you. I've also added features for optionally waiting until a snapshot is in the "available" state.
Oh. You're right, that's definitely not what's intended. PRs welcome! Is your cluster_id parameter == None?
